description: This Python source file defines application configuration using Pydantic's BaseSettings. It loads settings from environment variables and a .env file, providing defaults and validators for various configuration parameters such as server host, port, CORS settings, database connection URI, and OIDC authentication settings. The file also includes utility functions for caching configuration instances and parsing environment variable lists.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: A Pydantic BaseSettings class that encapsulates application configuration loaded from environment variables and a .env file. It includes various configuration options such as server parameters, CORS settings, database connection info, and OIDC authentication settings, with validation and default values.

methods.name: get_settings
methods.description: Returns a cached instance of the Settings class for efficient configuration retrieval.

methods.name: clear_settings_cache
methods.description: Clears the cache of the get_settings function, forcing reloading of configuration from environment variables.
